d1_1: ^YOU: Um, are you alright? You don't look too-
^CHARLIE: I'm so sick, man. Is this... the right place?
^There is a hospital two blocks away.
d1_1_hospital: ^YOU: There is a hospital two blocks away. Dr. Nielsen works night shifts and sees patients with... blood-related issues.
^CHARLIE: Yeah, that's a no-go, man. I'm trying to stay off the grid, if you know what I'm saying.
d1_1_story: ^YOU: If you tell me what happened, perhaps I could help?

^CHARLIE: I had a little... altercation. Nothing too bad, but now some people are looking for me, and I've been on the run for the past week. So earlier today I checked into this motel not far from here, right?

^CHARLIE: I was tired, not really paying attention to my surroundings, and I crashed on this dingy couch, and what I didn't notice is there was a bible on the couch. I mean, who puts a fucking bible on a couch?

^CHARLIE: I got violently sick after this, and I'm just... not feeling well, you know. So I just came here because I'd heard of the place, I didn't know what else to do, and I figured I could use a drink.
d1_1_body1: ^CHARLIE: Ooh, that hit the spot. I'm feeling better already. Thanks man!
^YOU: You're welcome. You need some more good stuff, you come back.
^CHARLIE: Nah, I don't think I'm sticking around. Need to get a move on, what with the fucking cops- I mean, nevermind. I gotta go now.
d1_1_body2: ^CHARLIE: Blaargh... what the hell is this stuff? I'm feeling even worse now. Are you trying to poison me? Fuck you man, I'm outta here.
d1_1_body3: ^CHARLIE: This... is not- hic!- too bad. It's been a while since I had a proper drink. All because of those fucking coppers. You know what, I'm done with this bullshit! I'm not running anymore. I'm going to go and... settle the scores.
d1_2: ^YOU: Hi there! What can I do you for?
^DIEGO: Heya, how's it going? A friend told me about this place. Can you hook me up with some good stuff? Like, something a bit... spicy, if you catch my drift?
d1_2_what: ^YOU: Spicy? We don't do spices. We just focus on the... core product.
^DIEGO: Man, I don't mean literally spicy. I want something with a kick, you know? Something... bad. Not bland and boring.
d1_2_yep: ^YOU: You came to the right place! What's your poison?
^DIEGO: Surprise me! Just make sure it's not bland and boring like the regular stuff.
d1_2_body1: ^DIEGO: What the hell, man? I specifically asked for something spicy, and you're gonna give me the blandest freaking blood I've ever had? I'm not paying for this shit. Hasta la vista.
d1_2_body2: ^DIEGO: Ooh, this... is... fucking dope! That's what I'm talking about. I'm so glad I came here! I think I'm going to be sick... but this is awesome man, thanks a bunch!
d1_2_body3: ^DIEGO: This stuff... is kind of meh. I'm peeved, actually. I walked forty minutes to get here, and this is what I get?
^DIEGO: I'll pay for the drink and everything, but you'll need to do better next time, dude. If I ever visit this place again, which is a big if.
d1_3: ^YOU: Welcome to the Bloodiest Mary! Anything I can do for you?
global decl: ^A woman in her early twenties, passed away due to blunt  in an alley next to a health food store.
^A teenage boy harvested from the local morgue. Acoording to the coroner's report, he died of acute respiratory distress after ingesting a laundry detergent pod.
^Male, late thirties, retrieved from a local bar after starting a drunken fight and getting knocked out.
